content: a dinomonster is my play on a creature that looks like a dinosaur and a monster this candygram can be used for more than candy and would make a sweet gift for any occasion all year round slide a note pencil or lollipop inside and you re ready to brighten someone s day supplies small amounts of yarn in a main color and a contrasting color as well as a heart color 3 75 mm crochet hook scissors needle for sewing down yarn tails embroidery floss needle for embroidery details 6 mm safety eyes optional small amount of poly-fil or stuffing of choice
